SELECT * FROM (select id,roomNo,doorlockId,remark,flag,sFlag from gs_room where floorcode=#{floorcode} AND floorcode!='202' ) x LEFT JOIN (SELECT a.guestName,a.startDate,a.endDate,b.roomId FROM gs_quickbooking a,gs_quickbooking_roomno b WHERE a.id = b.bookid AND unix_timestamp(NOW()) < unix_timestamp(a.enddate) AND unix_timestamp(NOW()) > unix_timestamp(a.startdate)) y ON x.id = y.roomid

select a.ID,a.typeId,a.ROOMTYPE,a.TYPENAME, case when b.price is null then a.HOUSEPRICES else b.price end HOUSEPRICES,a.roomSum from ( SELECT a.ID,a.typeId,a.ROOMTYPE,a.TYPENAME,a.HOUSEPRICES,COUNT(b.FLAG) roomSum FROM gs_roomtype a,gs_room b where a.typeid=b.ROOMTYPE AND b.FLAG='空房' GROUP BY a.typeid) a left join REALTIMEHOUSEPRICE b on a.typeid=b.typeid and b.time=DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d')
